item.title: UGC creator NYC to do a short interview - Upwork
item.description:
We need a UGC creator/model (female/male) in NYC to do a 30-second interview about our business for our social media accounts.

You will ask a few questions based on a script, and that's it. It will take around 30 minutes.

Reference: https://www.loom.com/share/16754b9a5cb94b2d8ec1f571e79f34c9?sid=ac4b1c2a-ff4b-467f-9f0f-0e1ae2efe6f2
Location: New York, Lower Manhattan.

We will cover Uber expenses and pay for your time.

Please send us a link to your social media account, ideally an example where you speak or do any sort of talking head/interview type of video.


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 16, 2024 23:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Video Commercial, Social Media Video, Content Creation, Acting, Modeling
Skills: UGC, Video Commercial, Social Media Video, Content Creation, Acting, Modeling
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Real Estate Property Video Shooting - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Videographer for Real Estate Property Videos in the Greater Seattle Area

We are seeking a videographer to capture high-quality videos of real estate properties. The role involves creating short videos, approximately 2-3 minutes in length, featuring a realtor introducing the exterior and interior of each property.

For each appointment, the videographer will be responsible for shooting five videos, with the total compensation of $100. To ensure consistency, we require the videos to be of similar quality to the samples provided at the following links:

- [Sample Video 1]  https://www.youtube.com/shorts/qxv72vH9PAc?app=desktop
- [Sample Video 2]  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZuK3YWsx10o

No captions or voices need to be added to the videos; the focus is solely on capturing appealing footage.

The primary objective of these videos is to introduce potential buyers to the properties. Therefore, the videographer must possess experience in capturing the best angles and utilizing appropriate lighting techniques to showcase the property's features. Attention to detail is essential to ensure visually appealing and engaging videos.

Required Skills:
- Proficiency in videography, including the use of drones
- Knowledge of various lighting techniques
- Strong attention to detail
- Video editing skills
- Creative storytelling abilities

To start, we will conduct a trial shoot of one video, offering a compensation of $20. If the result meets our expectations, we will proceed with shooting five videos per appointment for five adjacent properties, providing a total payment of $100 per appointment.

The ownership and copyright of the videos will be retained by the videographer.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 16, 2024 23:12 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Commercial Photography
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Commercial Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor + Motion Graphic Animator Wanted - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a competent and self-managed video production expert to assist with our marketing content creation.

I work on behalf of the Marketing department for IGS Group, a B2B technology company based in Australia. We are seeking someone with video editing and motion graphics abilities to produce internal and external facing video content for us based on briefs and sample footage.

Our perfect candidate would be available during Australian business hours, fluent in English with strong communication skills and creative thinking and able to autonomously turn around video content from brief to delivery in a quick amount of time.

Work will be completed on a project-by-project basis, with specific milestones to hit and a flexible amount of hours per project depending on scope and complexity.

We will need raw files turned over in addition to the final cut - but outside of that you are free to use whatever tools and software you like - if the final product looks good that's all that matters.

Our first project is an introduction promotional video for our natively owned software platform - please include details in your proposal if you have experience working on similar projects or making explanation videos featuring animation, screen recordings and creative graphics.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 23:05 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Animation, Video Production
Skills: Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Animation, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Specialist and Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are a small business looking for a talented Social Media Specialist and Content Creator to manage our social platforms. As a specialist, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective social media strategies to increase our online presence and engage with our target audience. You will also be responsible for creating high-quality and engaging content that aligns with our brand and resonates with our audience. This includes writing captivating captions, designing eye-catching graphics, and editing videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of social media platforms, excellent communication skills, and a creative mindset.

Skills required:
- Social media management
- Content creation
- Copywriting
- Graphic design
- Video editing

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 16, 2024 22:57 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.description:

make something similar to this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXXvb2rWUCM&t=24s
